Huang2 jia1 Xiang1 gang3 Jing3 cha2

sentences.english: All non-Nepalese students enrolled at any of Hong Kong's universities are eligible to participate in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 所有非尼泊爾裔香港註冊大學學生均可參加。

sentences.english: If you go to Aberdeen on Hong Kong Island, you will see Ocean Park.
sentences.chinese: 如果你到港島香港仔，你會看到海洋公園。

sentences.english: Tung is a justinian of The Justin University of HK.
sentences.chinese: 肥東是香港側田大學的側田學家。

sentences.english: In Hong Kong many square miles of land have been reclaimed from the sea.
sentences.chinese: 在香港，許多平方英里的陸地都是填海開拓出來的。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket between Hong Kong and Sanya on Dragonair.
sentences.chinese: 港龍航空公司來回香港至三亞經濟客位機票乙張。

sentences.english: Before returning to PRC in 1997, HK was already doing very well compared to SG.
sentences.chinese: 1997年香港迴歸前，它已經比新加坡做得好了。

sentences.english: Hong Kong Dr. Lucilly Hung treats many patients with the help of acupuncture.
sentences.chinese: 香港洪魯西醫生用針具治療了許多病人。

sentences.english: Hope that the United States will abandon the Cold War mentality, not in Hongkong to engage in political gamesmanship.
sentences.chinese: 希望美方摒棄冷戰思維，不在香港搞政治上的小動作。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong racing season could be extended from as early as summer next year.
sentences.chinese: 香港馬季最快可於下年年中延長。

sentences.english: China builds the Bird's Nest, while Hong Kong renovates the racecourse.
sentences.chinese: 中國建造鳥巢，香港改造馬場。

sentences.english: Hong Kong TVB actress Yung Mei Ling was discovered dead at her home yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 香港無線電視演員容美玲被發現死在家裏昨天。

sentences.english: The CD has also been released by the ROI, HK. , 2010.
sentences.chinese: 本曲CD亦已於2010年由香港龍音公司出品。

sentences.english: She was the soprano part leader in the University Choir, HKUSTSU.
sentences.chinese: 林氏曾爲香港科技大學學生會合唱團女高音聲部部長。

sentences.english: Wenweipao, which I enjoy reading, is published in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 我愛看的文匯報是在香港發行的。

sentences.english: Gambling is prohibited outside the enclaves of Hong Kong and Macau.
sentences.chinese: 香港和澳門賽馬的外圍賭馬是被禁止的。

sentences.english: Do you think the news media in Hong Kong have any scruple about criticizing the XX Government?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得香港新聞傳媒系批評XX政府既時候有冇顧忌？

definition: mainland China (PRC excluding Hong Kong and Macau, but including islands such as Hainan)/Japan (used in Taiwan during Japanese colonization)
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Hong Kong Island/abbr. for 香港島|香港岛[Xiang1 gang3 dao3]
Tsim Sha Tsui, urbanized area in Hong Kong
Shenzhen subprovincial city in Guangdong, special economic zone close to Hong Kong
